data.description: converting PERL ref to string & vice versa
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I have used this method instead of SOAP for passing PERL references
    over the Internet and it works fine. It is easier to use than
    SOAP::Lite or XML. When your PERL references contain a large
    quantity of data, this method will save your bandwidth due to good
    compression.
